    • Method Detail

      • addElement

        public int addElement(java.lang.String name)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        addElement is used to establish a sorted list of Elements (a name and a list of associated named, returning the index where it was placed in the list. The routine throws an exception if the name duplicates a name already found in the list (ignoring case).
        Parameters:
        name - - A name string
        Returns:
        index - the index where the name was inserted into the list (used for managing select lists)
        Throws:
        - - This name duplicates a name already found in the list.
        java.lang.Exception

      • removeElement

        public void removeElement(int elemIndex)
        Removes an element from the list.
        Parameters:
        elemIndex - - The index of the element to be removed

      • findElement

        public int findElement(java.lang.String name)
        Find an element in the list.
        Parameters:
        name - - The string of the name to be found
        Returns:
        - the index where it was found in the list Added for Della04
